Constants#

Description

Defines useful constants and conversion factors.

Note

No external dependancies.

Quick access

Variables:

a0, alpha_em, ang_to_inv_ev, e_em, ev_to_inv_cm, g_to_ev, ii, inv_ang_to_ev, inv_cm_to_ev, inv_ev_to_cm, kg_to_ev, km_per_sec_to_none, m_elec, pi, yr_to_inv_ev

Needed modules

  • iso_fortran_env

Variables

  • constants_util/a0 [real,parameter=2.681336e-4_real64]#

    Bohr radius, \(a_0\), \(\text{eV}^{-1}\)

  • constants_util/alpha_em [real,parameter=1.0_real64/137.0_real64]#

    Fine structure constant, \(\alpha\)

  • constants_util/ang_to_inv_ev [real,parameter=5.068e-4_real64]#
  • constants_util/e_em [real,parameter=sqrt(4*pi*alpha_em)]#
  • constants_util/ev_to_inv_cm [real,parameter=5.06773e4_real64]#
  • constants_util/g_to_ev [real,parameter=5.61e32_real64]#
  • constants_util/ii [complex,parameter=(0.0_real64,1.0_real64)]#
  • constants_util/inv_ang_to_ev [real,parameter=1973.37_real64]#
  • constants_util/inv_cm_to_ev [real,parameter=1.97327e-5_real64]#
  • constants_util/inv_ev_to_cm [real,parameter=1.97327e-5_real64]#
  • constants_util/kg_to_ev [real,parameter=5.61e35_real64]#
  • constants_util/km_per_sec_to_none [real,parameter=3.33563e-6_real64]#
  • constants_util/m_elec [real,parameter=511.0e3_real64]#

    Electron mass, \(m_e\), eV

  • constants_util/pi [real,parameter=4.0_real64*atan(1.0_real64)]#
  • constants_util/yr_to_inv_ev [real,parameter=4.7912e22_real64]#
